response.overview: My step-mom, London, walks into my bedroom and shes wearing a green skirt with a maroon colored blouse. She tells me that my step-dad is going to be away on a business trip this week so she will be alone with me. Maybe we can have some special time together! she suggests.  My step-mom is wearing a black bathrobe as she tells me that she wants anal sex for breakfast this morning! We walk into the bedroom and she lies down on the pale pink comforter.  My step-mom is lying down on the bed and she is completely naked while she chats on the phone with my step-dad. She looks so hot lying there, so I whip my cock out and decide to have some fun!  My step-mom, London, and her step-sister, Cory, are sitting down next to each other on the green bedding. Cory is wearing a fuschia dress and London is wearing a peach-colored dress, as they lean in to kiss each other.  I walk into the bedroom and I find my step-mom lying down with her legs spread and my step-aunts face in my step-moms pussy!
response.title: My New Step Mom
